steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
Select the 'Print' option from the menu.
In the Print dialog box, locate the 'Print One Sided' or 'Print on Both Sides' option.
If you want to print single-sided, select the 'Print One Sided' option.
If you want to print double-sided, select the 'Print on Both Sides' option.
Adjust any other print settings as desired, such as the number of copies or page range.
Click on the 'Print' button to start printing the document.
